tt0068646.Summary: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.
tt0068646.Title: The Godfather

tt0111161.Summary: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.
tt0111161.Title: The Shawshank Redemption

tt0108052.Summary: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, industrialist Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish workforce after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.
tt0108052.Title: Schindler's List

tt0081398.Summary: The life of boxer Jake LaMotta, whose violence and temper that led him to the top in the ring destroyed his life outside of it.
tt0081398.Title: Raging Bull

tt0034583.Summary: A cynical American expatriate struggles to decide whether or not he should help his former lover and her fugitive husband escape French Morocco.
tt0034583.Title: Casablanca

tt0033467.Summary: Following the death of publishing tycoon Charles Foster Kane, reporters scramble to uncover the meaning of his final utterance; 'Rosebud'.
tt0033467.Title: Citizen Kane

tt0031381.Summary: A manipulative woman and a roguish man conduct a turbulent romance during the American Civil War and Reconstruction periods.
tt0031381.Title: Gone with the Wind

tt0032138.Summary: Dorothy Gale is swept away from a farm in Kansas to a magical land of Oz in a tornado and embarks on a quest with her new friends to see the Wizard who can help her return home to Kansas and help her friends as well.
tt0032138.Title: The Wizard of Oz

tt0073486.Summary: A criminal pleads insanity and is admitted to a mental institution, where he rebels against the oppressive nurse and rallies up the scared patients.
tt0073486.Title: One Flew Over the Cuckoo's Nest

tt0056172.Summary: The story of T.E. Lawrence, the English officer who successfully united and led the diverse, often warring, Arab tribes during World War I in order to fight the Turks.
tt0056172.Title: Lawrence of Arabia

tt0052357.Summary: A former police detective juggles wrestling with his personal demons and becoming obsessed with a hauntingly beautiful woman.
tt0052357.Title: Vertigo

tt0054215.Summary: A Phoenix secretary embezzles $40,000 from her employer's client, goes on the run, and checks into a remote motel run by a young man under the domination of his mother.
tt0054215.Title: Psycho

tt0071562.Summary: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York City is portrayed, while his son, Michael, expands and tightens his grip on the family crime syndicate.
tt0071562.Title: The Godfather: Part II

tt0047296.Summary: An ex-prize fighter turned longshoreman struggles to stand up to his corrupt union bosses.
tt0047296.Title: On the Waterfront

tt0043014.Summary: A screenwriter develops a dangerous relationship with a faded film star determined to make a triumphant return.
tt0043014.Title: Sunset Blvd.

tt0109830.Summary: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate and other historical events unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75, whose only desire is to be reunited with his childhood sweetheart.
tt0109830.Title: Forrest Gump

tt0059742.Summary: A woman leaves an Austrian convent to become a governess to the children of a Naval officer widower.
tt0059742.Title: The Sound of Music

tt0050083.Summary: A jury holdout attempts to prevent a miscarriage of justice by forcing his colleagues to reconsider the evidence.
tt0050083.Title: 12 Angry Men

tt0055614.Summary: Two youngsters from rival New York City gangs fall in love, but tensions between their respective friends build toward tragedy.
tt0055614.Title: West Side Story

tt0076759.Summary: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station, while also attempting to rescue Princess Leia from the mysterious Darth Vader.
tt0076759.Title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope

tt0062622.Summary: After discovering a mysterious artifact buried beneath the Lunar surface, mankind sets off on a quest to find its origins with help from intelligent supercomputer H.A.L. 9000.
tt0062622.Title: 2001: A Space Odyssey

tt0083866.Summary: A troubled child summons the courage to help a friendly alien escape Earth and return to his home world.
tt0083866.Title: E.T. the Extra-Terrestrial

tt0102926.Summary: A young F.B.I. cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.
tt0102926.Title: The Silence of the Lambs

tt0071315.Summary: A private detective hired to expose an adulterer finds himself caught up in a web of deceit, corruption, and murder.
tt0071315.Title: Chinatown

tt0050212.Summary: British POWs are forced to build a railway bridge across the river Kwai for their Japanese captors, not knowing that the allied forces are planning to destroy it.
tt0050212.Title: The Bridge on the River Kwai

tt0045152.Summary: A silent film production company and cast make a difficult transition to sound.
tt0045152.Title: Singin' in the Rain

tt0038650.Summary: An angel is sent from Heaven to help a desperately frustrated businessman by showing him what life would have been like if he had never existed.
tt0038650.Title: It's a Wonderful Life

tt0057012.Summary: An insane general triggers a path to nuclear holocaust that a War Room full of politicians and generals frantically tries to stop.
tt0057012.Title: Dr. Strangelove

tt0053291.Summary: After two male musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all-female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.
tt0053291.Title: Some Like It Hot

tt0052618.Summary: After a Jewish prince is betrayed and sent into slavery by a Roman friend, he regains his freedom and comes back for revenge.
tt0052618.Title: Ben-Hur

tt0078788.Summary: A U.S. Army officer serving in Vietnam is tasked with assassinating a renegade Special Forces Colonel who sees himself as a god.
tt0078788.Title: Apocalypse Now

tt0086879.Summary: The life, success and troubles of Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, as told by Antonio Salieri, the contemporaneous composer who was insanely jealous of Mozart's talent and claimed to have murdered him.
tt0086879.Title: Amadeus

tt0167260.Summary: Gandalf and Aragorn lead the World of Men against Sauron's army to draw his gaze from Frodo and Sam as they approach Mount Doom with the One Ring.
tt0167260.Title: The Lord of the Rings: The Return of the King

tt0172495.Summary: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.
tt0172495.Title: Gladiator

tt0120338.Summary: A seventeen-year-old aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the luxurious, ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.
tt0120338.Title: Titanic

tt0045793.Summary: In Hawaii in 1941, a private is cruelly punished for not boxing on his unit's team, while his captain's wife and second-in-command are falling in love.
tt0045793.Title: From Here to Eternity

tt0120815.Summary: Following the Normandy Landings, a group of U.S. soldiers go behind enemy lines to retrieve a paratrooper whose brothers have been killed in action.
tt0120815.Title: Saving Private Ryan

tt0105695.Summary: Retired Old West gunslinger William Munny reluctantly takes on one last job, with the help of his old partner Ned Logan and a young man, The "Schofield Kid."
tt0105695.Title: Unforgiven

tt0082971.Summary: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its awesome powers.
tt0082971.Title: Raiders of the Lost Ark

tt0075148.Summary: A small-time boxer gets a supremely rare chance to fight a heavy-weight champion in a bout in which he strives to go the distance for his self-respect.
tt0075148.Title: Rocky

tt0044081.Summary: Disturbed Blanche DuBois moves in with her sister in New Orleans and is tormented by her brutish brother-in-law while her reality crumbles around her.
tt0044081.Title: A Streetcar Named Desire

tt0032904.Summary: When a rich woman's ex-husband and a tabloid-type reporter turn up just before her planned remarriage, she begins to learn the truth about herself.
tt0032904.Title: The Philadelphia Story

tt0056592.Summary: Atticus Finch, a lawyer in the Depression-era South, defends a black man against an undeserved rape charge, and his children against prejudice.
tt0056592.Title: To Kill a Mockingbird

tt0043278.Summary: Three friends struggle to find work in Paris. Things become more complicated when two of them fall in love with the same woman.
tt0043278.Title: An American in Paris

tt0036868.Summary: Three World War II veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.
tt0036868.Title: The Best Years of Our Lives

tt0058385.Summary: Snobbish phonetics Professor Henry Higgins agrees to a wager that he can make flower girl Eliza Doolittle presentable in high society.
tt0058385.Title: My Fair Lady

tt0066921.Summary: In the future, a sadistic gang leader is imprisoned and volunteers for a conduct-aversion experiment, but it doesn't go as planned.
tt0066921.Title: A Clockwork Orange

tt0059113.Summary: The life of a Russian physician and poet who, although married to another, falls in love with a political activist's wife and experiences hardship during World War I and then the October Revolution.
tt0059113.Title: Doctor Zhivago

tt0049730.Summary: An American Civil War veteran embarks on a journey to rescue his niece from the Comanches.
tt0049730.Title: The Searchers

tt0073195.Summary: When a killer shark unleashes chaos on a beach community, it's up to a local sheriff, a marine biologist, and an old seafarer to hunt the beast down.
tt0073195.Title: Jaws

tt0066206.Summary: The World War II phase of the career of controversial American general George S. Patton.
tt0066206.Title: Patton

tt0064115.Summary: Wyoming, early 1900s. Butch Cassidy and The Sundance Kid are the leaders of a band of outlaws. After a train robbery goes wrong they find themselves on the run with a posse hard on their heels. Their solution - escape to Bolivia.
tt0064115.Title: Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid

tt0040897.Summary: Two Americans searching for work in Mexico convince an old prospector to help them mine for gold in the Sierra Madre Mountains.
tt0040897.Title: The Treasure of the Sierra Madre

tt0060196.Summary: A bounty hunting scam joins two men in an uneasy alliance against a third in a race to find a fortune in gold buried in a remote cemetery.
tt0060196.Title: The Good, the Bad and the Ugly

tt0053604.Summary: A man tries to rise in his company by letting its executives use his apartment for trysts, but complications and a romance of his own ensue.
tt0053604.Title: The Apartment

tt0091763.Summary: A young soldier in Vietnam faces a moral crisis when confronted with the horrors of war and the duality of man.
tt0091763.Title: Platoon

tt0044706.Summary: A town Marshal, despite the disagreements of his newlywed bride and the townspeople around him, must face a gang of deadly killers alone at high noon when the gang leader, an outlaw he sent up years ago, arrives on the noon train.
tt0044706.Title: High Noon

tt0112573.Summary: Scottish warrior William Wallace leads his countrymen in a rebellion to free his homeland from the tyranny of King Edward I of England.
tt0112573.Title: Braveheart

tt0099348.Summary: Lieutenant John Dunbar, assigned to a remote western Civil War outpost, befriends wolves and Indians, making him an intolerable aberration in the military.
tt0099348.Title: Dances with Wolves

tt0107290.Summary: A pragmatic paleontologist visiting an almost complete theme park is tasked with protecting a couple of kids after a power failure causes the park's cloned dinosaurs to run loose.
tt0107290.Title: Jurassic Park

tt0070047.Summary: When a 12-year-old girl is possessed by a mysterious entity, her mother seeks the help of two priests to save her.
tt0070047.Title: The Exorcist

tt0253474.Summary: A Polish Jewish musician struggles to survive the destruction of the Warsaw ghetto of World War II.
tt0253474.Title: The Pianist

tt0099685.Summary: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his relationship with his wife Karen Hill and his mob partners Jimmy Conway and Tommy DeVito in the Italian-American crime syndicate.
tt0099685.Title: Goodfellas

tt0077416.Summary: An in-depth examination of the ways in which the U.S. Vietnam War impacts and disrupts the lives of people in a small industrial town in Pennsylvania.
tt0077416.Title: The Deer Hunter

tt0020629.Summary: A German youth eagerly enters World War I, but his enthusiasm wanes as he gets a firsthand view of the horror.
tt0020629.Title: All Quiet on the Western Front

tt0061418.Summary: Bored waitress Bonnie Parker falls in love with an ex-con named Clyde Barrow and together they start a violent crime spree through the country, stealing cars and robbing banks.
tt0061418.Title: Bonnie and Clyde

tt0067116.Summary: A pair of NYC cops in the Narcotics Bureau stumble onto a drug smuggling job with a French connection.
tt0067116.Title: The French Connection

tt0021749.Summary: With the aid of a wealthy erratic tippler, a dewy-eyed tramp who has fallen in love with a sightless flower girl accumulates money to be able to help her medically.
tt0021749.Title: City Lights

tt0025316.Summary: A spoiled heiress running away from her family is helped by a man who is actually a reporter in need of a story.
tt0025316.Title: It Happened One Night

tt0043924.Summary: A poor boy gets a job working for his rich uncle and ends up falling in love with two women.
tt0043924.Title: A Place in the Sun

tt0064665.Summary: A naive hustler travels from Texas to New York City to seek personal fortune, finding a new friend in the process.
tt0064665.Title: Midnight Cowboy

tt0031679.Summary: A naive man is appointed to fill a vacancy in the United States Senate. His plans promptly collide with political corruption, but he doesn't back down.
tt0031679.Title: Mr. Smith Goes to Washington

tt0095953.Summary: Selfish yuppie Charlie Babbitt's father left a fortune to his savant brother Raymond and a pittance to Charlie; they travel cross-country.
tt0095953.Title: Rain Man

tt0075686.Summary: Neurotic New York comedian Alvy Singer falls in love with the ditzy Annie Hall.
tt0075686.Title: Annie Hall

tt0116282.Summary: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.
tt0116282.Title: Fargo

tt0049261.Summary: Sprawling epic covering the life of a Texas cattle rancher and his family and associates.
tt0049261.Title: Giant

tt0046303.Summary: A weary gunfighter attempts to settle down with a homestead family, but a smoldering settler/rancher conflict forces him to act.
tt0046303.Title: Shane

tt0032551.Summary: A poor Midwest family is forced off their land. They travel to California, suffering the misfortunes of the homeless in the Great Depression.
tt0032551.Title: The Grapes of Wrath

tt0120689.Summary: The lives of guards on Death Row are affected by one of their charges: a black man accused of child murder and rape, yet who has a mysterious gift.
tt0120689.Title: The Green Mile

tt0075860.Summary: Roy Neary, an electric lineman, watches how his quiet and ordinary daily life turns upside down after a close encounter with a UFO.
tt0075860.Title: Close Encounters of the Third Kind

tt0073440.Summary: Over the course of a few hectic days, numerous interrelated people prepare for a political convention.
tt0073440.Title: Nashville

tt0074958.Summary: A television network cynically exploits a deranged former anchor's ravings and revelations about the news media for its own profit.
tt0074958.Title: Network

tt0061722.Summary: A disillusioned college graduate finds himself torn between his older lover and her daughter.
tt0061722.Title: The Graduate

tt0069704.Summary: A couple of high school grads spend one final night cruising the strip with their buddies before they go off to college.
tt0069704.Title: American Graffiti

tt0110912.Summary: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster and his wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.
tt0110912.Title: Pulp Fiction

tt0086425.Summary: Follows hard-to-please Aurora looking for love, and her daughter's family problems.
tt0086425.Title: Terms of Endearment

tt0119217.Summary: Will Hunting, a janitor at M.I.T., has a gift for mathematics, but needs help from a psychologist to find direction in his life.
tt0119217.Title: Good Will Hunting

tt0043265.Summary: In WWI Africa, a gin-swilling riverboat captain is persuaded by a strait-laced missionary to use his boat to attack an enemy warship.
tt0043265.Title: The African Queen

tt0031971.Summary: A group of people traveling on a stagecoach find their journey complicated by the threat of Geronimo and learn something about each other in the process.
tt0031971.Title: Stagecoach

tt0026752.Summary: First mate Fletcher Christian leads a revolt against his sadistic commander, Captain Bligh, in this classic seafaring adventure, based on the real-life 1788 mutiny.
tt0026752.Title: Mutiny on the Bounty

tt0032553.Summary: Dictator Adenoid Hynkel tries to expand his empire while a poor Jewish barber tries to avoid persecution from Hynkel's regime.
tt0032553.Title: The Great Dictator

tt0036775.Summary: An insurance representative lets himself be talked by a seductive housewife into a murder/insurance fraud scheme that arouses the suspicion of an insurance investigator.
tt0036775.Title: Double Indemnity

tt0033870.Summary: A private detective takes on a case that involves him with three eccentric criminals, a gorgeous liar, and their quest for a priceless statuette.
tt0033870.Title: The Maltese Falcon

tt0032145.Summary: A servant in the house of Wuthering Heights tells a traveler the unfortunate tale of lovers Cathy and Heathcliff.
tt0032145.Title: Wuthering Heights

tt0075314.Summary: A mentally unstable veteran works as a nighttime taxi driver in New York City, where the perceived decadence and sleaze fuels his urge for violent action by attempting to liberate a presidential campaign worker and an underage prostitute.
tt0075314.Title: Taxi Driver

tt0047396.Summary: A wheelchair-bound photographer spies on his neighbors from his apartment window and becomes convinced one of them has committed murder.
tt0047396.Title: Rear Window

tt0041959.Summary: Pulp novelist Holly Martins travels to shadowy, postwar Vienna, only to find himself investigating the mysterious death of an old friend, Harry Lime.
tt0041959.Title: The Third Man

tt0048545.Summary: A rebellious young man with a troubled past comes to a new town, finding friends and enemies.
tt0048545.Title: Rebel Without a Cause

tt0053125.Summary: A New York City advertising executive goes on the run after being mistaken for a government agent by a group of foreign spies.
tt0053125.Title: North by Northwest

tt0035575.Summary: The life of the renowned musical composer, playwright, actor, dancer, and singer George M. Cohan.
tt0035575.Title: Yankee Doodle Dandy
